× About Services Clients Contact

Collapsed Sidebar

Click on the hamburger menu/bar icon to open the sidebar, and push this content to the right.

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; // import * as $ from 'jquery'; declare function openNav(): void; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidenav', templateUrl: './sidenav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidenav.component.css'] }) export class SidenavComponent implements OnInit { divshowfeed = true constructor() { this.divshowfeed = !this.divshowfeed; } ngOnInit(): void { } }
